name: MZGZMB
description:
MZGZMB

You have 60 seconds to earn as much stars as You can. Stars are given for each red and blue mushroom. Catching during jump gives much more stars. Additionally blue mushroom freezes time for few seconds. Avoid black mushroom which wipe outs all mushrooms from scene. Look at border arrows, which indicates where are mushrooms.

Controls: Z, X for jumps (left/right), Left/Right arrows for movement.
